mapper.insert: insert into Car (carId, mid,author, carName, year, distance, fuel, area, price, content, writeDate, writeTime, readCount) values (#{carId}, #{mid}, #{author}, #{carName}, #{year},#{distance},#{fuel},#{area},#{price},#{content},#{writeDate}, #{writeTime}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(carId) AS carId FROM car;
